content: MQN-HDG plus Hot-dip galvanized (HDG) channel connector for joining any elements with a butterfly opening ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to be simple, compact and time-saving Universal â€“ one connection element for all MQ strut channels Simple removal Holds securely once it has been pressed, turned and tightened correctly One-part fastener replaces a spring nut, bolt and washer for quick installation Applications Connecting angles to strut channels Connection element for U-frame/crossbeam structures Connecting strut channels and structural elements Designed for long lifetime in temperate outdoor climates Recommended for use in moderately corrosive outdoor and indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Tightening torque: 30 ft-lbf Material composition: Bolt: M10 grade 8.8 - DIN ISO 898, S355 MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Plate: DD11 - DIN EN 10111 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Tightening torque | 30 ft-lbf | Material composition | Bolt: M10 grade 8.8 - DIN ISO 898, S355 MC - DIN EN 10149-2, Plate: DD11 - DIN EN 10111 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG Plus | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Wrench size | 17 mm | Weight | 0.15 lb ### ITEMS- 387779 - Push button MQN HDG plus - Package Size 50 pc
